name: HANZ!
description: Fight with crowds of enemies, repel attacks with turrets, defeat invulnerable bosses in the new top-down shooter HANZ!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 – 64 bits Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB NVIDIA GeForce 9800GTX / ATI Radeon HD 3xxx series Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 – 64 bits Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB NVIDIA GTX 660 / Radeon RX 460 or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
